Success_ConnectMBMF: The Make From item was connected.
Success_UpdateMBMF: The Make From item was updated.
Error_AddMBMFItemKO: No more items can be added under Make From item.
Error_ConnectMBMF: An error occurred while connecting the Make From item.
Error_AddNodeOn_MBMFParent: No more items can be added under Parent of Make From item.
Error_AddNodeOn_MBMF: No more items can be added under Make From item.
Error_AddNodeOn_RM: No more items can be added under Raw Material.
Error_GetMatInfo: An error occurred while fetching the Material details.
Error_Get_MBMF: An error occurred while loading Make From items. Refresh the page.
Error_Remove_MBMF_VPMInstance: Selected items must have similar connection. The selected items must be either VPM or Make From.
RemoveMBMFFailed: The error occurred while detaching the selected item.
